I'm in eighth grade, and there's a knock on the classroom door.

translation.zh: 我看过去 是副校长普莱斯先生

translation.zh: “通常都是我去找他 他不会找我”

translation.zh: 所以我跟他走到走廊

[Mark] He opened my locker, and he just clears the whole thing out.

translation.en: See now, I was a middle-school kid.
translation.zh: 我当时只是个初中生

translation.en: So I had, like, all sorts of, like, pencils and drawings
translation.zh: 所以我有各种铅笔和图画

translation.en: and notes from girls in class and stuff, you know.
translation.zh: 还有女同学传来的纸条之类的东西

translation.zh: 他就把我的东西全倒在地上

translation.zh: 散落得到处都是 然后开始翻找

translation.zh: 我心想“该死！这下严重了”

translation.en: And as he's digging through all my crap,
translation.zh: 他在翻我的东西时

translation.en: there's, like, a very awkward silence.
translation.zh: 出现了一阵尴尬的沉默

translation.en: He looks at me and he's like, "Do you know what I'm looking for today?"
translation.zh: 他看着我说 “你知道我今天想找什么吗？”

translation.en: And so I just play stupid. I'm like, "What?"
translation.zh: 而我只好装傻 我问“什么？”

translation.en: And he's… he's like, "Drugs. Do you have any drugs today?"
translation.zh: 他说“毒品 你今天吸毒了吗？”

translation.en: And in my little, like, pipsqueak voice, I'm like, "No, no. No. No drugs.
translation.zh: 我用我最微弱的声音说 “没有 没有毒品”

translation.en: I-I don't know what you're talking about."
translation.zh: “我不知道你在说什么”

translation.en: And, uh, I can tell he's about to let me go,
translation.zh: 我知道他准备要放弃了

translation.en: but he's kind of looking down on the ground at all this stuff,
translation.zh: 但他低头看着地上的东西

translation.en: and I don't… I don't remember if he… if it was an accident
translation.zh: 我不记得他是不小心

translation.en: or if he was, like, stepping on the backpack on purpose,
translation.zh: 还是故意踩到我的背包

translation.en: but he steps on my backpack,
translation.zh: 但他踩到我的背包

translation.en: and he feels something's still in it.
translation.zh: 他觉得背包里还有东西

translation.en: And he's like, "What is that?"
translation.zh: 于是他问“那是什么？”

translation.en: And I was like, "What is what?"
translation.zh: 我回答“什么是什么？”

translation.en: And the truth was is that I had cut a hole in the backpack,
translation.zh: 事实是 我在背包上割了一个洞

translation.en: between the pockets,
translation.zh: 在内袋之间

translation.en: and stuck the drugs in there and then kind of sewn the bottom shut,
translation.zh: 把毒品塞进去 然后把底部缝起来

translation.en: but it was kind of… it was so you could kind of easily get it open.
translation.zh: 但有点松 所以很容易就能打开

translation.en: And he found that hole and he found the drugs,
translation.zh: 他找到那个洞 找到了毒品

translation.en: and he ripped it out, and he threw 'em on the desk.
translation.zh: 他把毒品扯出来 丢在桌上

translation.en: I don't remember what he said, but I remember the look,
translation.zh: 我不记得他说了什么 但我记得他的表情

translation.en: and it… and it had the look of, "You're fucked."
translation.zh: 他的表情像是在说“你完蛋了”

translation.en: The next thing I remember, basically, is being handcuffed,
translation.zh: 接下来我只记得 我被铐上手铐

translation.en: handcuffed and escorted out of the school.
translation.zh: 上铐并被押着离开学校

translation.en: And I remember the cop, he's like… he's like, "How old are you?"
translation.zh: 我记得警察问我“你几岁？”

translation.en: And I said, "13." And he was like,
translation.zh: 我说“13岁”

translation.en: "What on earth made you do this?"
translation.zh: 他说“你怎么会做这种事？”

translation.en: As we're walking out, this girl, her name was Becca,
translation.zh: 我们走出去时 有个名叫贝卡的女生

translation.en: this girl's coming in,
translation.zh: 她走进来

translation.en: this, like, really cute girl I used to flirt with.
translation.zh: 我曾经跟她调情过 非常可爱的女生

translation.en: And she sees me, and she's like, "Oh, hey, Mark."
translation.zh: 她看到我后说“嗨 马克”

translation.en: And, like, smiles. And I'm like, "Hi." And then she goes, "Hi, Mr. Price."
translation.zh: 并且面带微笑 而我说“嗨” 她也说“嗨 普莱斯先生”

translation.en: And then she looks over at the cop,
translation.zh: 然后她看向那个警察

translation.en: then she looks back at me, and she's like…
translation.zh: 再回头看我 然后就…

translation.en: And, like, completely, like, loses it and, like, runs down the hall.
translation.zh: 完全吓疯 飞快跑过走廊

translation.en: In all the rebellious stuff I did, it always felt like I had an exit.
translation.zh: 我做过的叛逆事数不胜数 但我一向觉得自己有退路

translation.en: You know, it's like, "Oh, if shit gets too serious,
translation.zh: 如果事态变得太严重

translation.en: I can always just, like, drop everything and go back to normal."
translation.zh: 我随时都可以放下一切 恢复正常

translation.en: And that was the first time that I was, like,
translation.zh: 而那是我第一次觉得

translation.en: "Wow. Things are never going to be normal again after this."
translation.zh: “天啊 在这件事之后” “一切都不可能再恢复正常了”

translation.en: I got thrown in, like, a juvie jail for the day.
translation.zh: 我被关进少年监狱一天

translation.en: And I sat there all day waiting for my parents to show up.
translation.zh: 我坐在那里一整天 等我父母出现

translation.en: Yeah. I just remember my mom coming in,
translation.zh: 对 我只记得我妈走进来

translation.en: tears streaming down her face,
translation.zh: 眼泪从她脸上流下来

translation.en: and something fundamentally changed.
translation.zh: 然后有件事彻底改变了

translation.en: My whole, you know, the false confidence,
translation.zh: 我虚假的自信

translation.en: the bravado of a shithead 13-year-old, like, it all just deflated.
translation.zh: 13岁小屁孩的虚张声势 全都泄了气

translation.en: It just… I just felt empty.
translation.zh: 我觉得很空虚

translation.en: I felt like a little boy.
translation.zh: 我觉得自己像个小男孩

translation.en: Just totally helpless.
translation.zh: 非常无助

translation.en: And I was.
translation.zh: 我确实很无助

translation.en: I think we live in a culture today
translation.zh: 我认为我们当今的文化

translation.en: of what I would describe as "delusional positivity."
translation.zh: 充斥着所谓的“妄想的正面态度”

translation.en: It's been very fashionable, especially in the self-help industry,
translation.zh: 这一直很流行 尤其是在心理励志界

translation.en: but in the wider culture at large,
translation.zh: 但运用到更广泛的文化中

translation.en: to simply believe things you want to believe
translation.zh: 因为感觉很好 就单纯地相信

translation.en: because they feel good.
translation.zh: 你想相信的事

translation.en: And we're encouraged to do this at every turn,
translation.zh: 我们随时随地都受到鼓励

translation.en: whether it's, you know, beer commercials or some guru standing on stage,
translation.zh: 无论是啤酒广告 或是舞台上的某个大师告诉你

translation.en: telling you that you can achieve all your dreams, yada-yada-yada.
translation.zh: 你能实现所有梦想之类的话

translation.en: I find this attitude to be very dangerous and damaging,
translation.zh: 我觉得这种态度很危险 有害无益

translation.en: because the fact of the matter is
translation.zh: 因为事实上

translation.en: is that life is always going to suck a little bit.
translation.zh: 人生总会有一点不顺

translation.en: And it turns out, the more we learn and understand about our psychology,
translation.zh: 结果 我们越了解自己的心理

translation.en: the more it turns out
translation.zh: 就越会发现

translation.en: that our… our brain is kind of playing this game with us.
translation.zh: 大脑一直在跟我们玩游戏

translation.en: Generally speaking, things in the material world
translation.zh: 一般来说 物质世界的东西

translation.en: work very algorithmically.
translation.zh: 都是以演算法运算的

translation.en: You know, it's like if you want X result,
translation.zh: 如果你想得到X结果

translation.en: you need to do A, B and C to get there.
translation.zh: 就得先做到A、B、C

translation.en: It's like a Lego set, like, you find the steps,
translation.zh: 就像乐高积木组 你找到步骤

translation.en: and then you follow the steps, and the thing happens.
translation.zh: 然后跟着步骤做 事情就会发生

translation.en: Where that breaks down and stops working
translation.zh: 但一切也可能瓦解并停止运作

translation.en: is in the experiences of our own mind.
translation.zh: 原因在于我们脑中的经验

translation.en: So, take happiness, for example.
translation.zh: 以幸福为例

translation.en: There's no formula for happiness. There's no X, Y, Z.
translation.zh: 幸福没有公式 没有X、Y、Z

translation.en: Do these things every day for three weeks and you'll be happy.
translation.zh: 每天做这些事 持续三周 你就会幸福

translation.en: Right? Like, it doesn't work that way.
translation.zh: 对吧？幸福不是那样来的

translation.en: Happiness is not algorithmic.
translation.zh: 幸福无法演算

translation.en: It's not a solvable equation.
translation.zh: 不是可解的方程式

translation.en: But our mind plays this game with us.
translation.zh: 但我们的大脑在跟我们玩游戏

translation.en: Our mind tells us that as soon as you get X,
translation.zh: 我们的大脑告诉我们 只要得到X

translation.en: everything is gonna be great.
translation.zh: 一切就会很棒

translation.en: Or as soon as you get rid of Y, everything is gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 或者只要摆脱Y 一切都会很好

translation.en: And we believe it.
translation.zh: 我们深信不疑

translation.en: And it's not true.
translation.zh: 但那不是真的

translation.en: You know, it's… it's like there's always this little carrot
translation.zh: 就好像我们面前总是

translation.en: dangling in front of us.
translation.zh: 吊着一根小胡萝卜

translation.en: Man, I just… if I can just get a raise at work
translation.zh: 总觉得如果工作能得到加薪

translation.en: then, like, things are gonna be fine, you know?
translation.zh: 一切就能迎刃而解 你懂吗？

translation.en: And then you get the raise at work,
translation.zh: 等到工作上得到加薪

translation.en: and it's, like, all these new responsibilities happen.
translation.zh: 等到工作上得到加薪 新的责任又随之而来

translation.en: People are reporting to you, you're having to work on weekends.
translation.zh: 人们向你报告 你必须在周末工作

translation.en: You're like, "Shit. If I could just get more vacation time,
translation.zh: 你心想“可恶 要是能有更多假期”

translation.en: then everything will be great."
translation.zh: “一切就会很美好”

translation.en: And then you get more vacation time, and it turns out that,
translation.zh: 然后你得到更多假期 结果又会觉得

translation.en: well, damn, there are a lot of places to go on vacation,
translation.zh: 可恶 有好多地方可以去度假

translation.en: and you're dissatisfied with pretty much any place you pick,
translation.zh: 你对你挑选的地方几乎都不满意

translation.en: 'cause the one on Instagram looked better.
translation.zh: 因为照片墙上的照片比较好看

translation.en: And you're like, "Shit. I need to go on vacation to the one on Instagram."
translation.zh: 你想“我要去照片墙上的地方度假”

translation.en: And then you go there and it turns out the weather is bad.
translation.zh: 然后你去了 结果天气很差

translation.en: And so there's just, like, there's shit wherever you go.
translation.zh: 所以不管你去哪里 都会遇到鸟事

translation.en: There's always a problem. There's always dissatisfaction.
translation.zh: 总是有问题 总是有不满

translation.en: Yet our mind keeps playing this game with us.
translation.zh: 但我们的大脑却一直在跟我们玩游戏

translation.en: It keeps dangling the reward in front of us,
translation.zh: 不断把奖赏悬在我们眼前

translation.en: convincing us that if we can just take that next step,
translation.zh: 说服我们 只要踏出下一步

translation.en: then we'll live happily ever after.
translation.zh: 就能从此过着幸福快乐的日子

translation.en: Psychologists call this the hedonic treadmill.
translation.zh: 心理学家称之为享乐跑步机

translation.en: It's this idea that we keep running
translation.zh: 这个概念就是 我们一直跑

translation.en: to accomplish something that's gonna make us feel better.
translation.zh: 是为了完成某件事 而那会让我们感觉更好

translation.en: But the fact of the matter is
translation.zh: 但事实是

translation.en: we're spending all this energy yet getting nowhere.
translation.zh: 我们花了这么多精力 却一无所获

translation.en: So, this idea that we're gonna somehow find some magical solution
translation.zh: 所以我们想要找到神奇的方法

translation.en: to… to dissolve our suffering,
translation.zh: 化解我们的痛苦

translation.en: to dissolve our… our dissatisfaction permanently,
translation.zh: 永久化解我们的不满

translation.en: I… It's just bullshit.
translation.zh: 这根本是鬼扯

translation.en: Happiness is great, but it's kind of blah,
translation.zh: 幸福固然很棒 但也有点无趣

translation.en: because it's when you're happy, it means nothing needs to change.
translation.zh: 因为幸福 就代表一切都不需要改变

translation.en: And so, I think it's important to learn how to sit with your negative emotions,
translation.zh: 所以我觉得学会面对负面情绪很重要

translation.en: because it… it's like cross-training for your mind.
translation.zh: 因为这就像对心灵进行交叉训练

translation.zh: 被颂扬为解决所有社会弊病的万灵丹

translation.zh: 如果每个人都相信自己有权 索取比付出的更多

translation.zh: 至于特权

translation.zh: 就是当你感觉你应得某样东西的利益

translation.zh: 而不必放弃某样东西的成本

translation.zh: 你觉得自己应该得到结果

translation.en: without having the sacrifice.
translation.zh: 而不用牺牲

translation.zh: 吉米的问题是 他认为

translation.en: he should be a total badass and a huge success,

translation.zh: 我们会很棒 一切都会很完美

translation.zh: 这是我们自身的保护层 因为它防止我们

translation.zh: 回去感受那种剧烈疼痛

translation.zh: 就像我们脑中的断路器

translation.zh: 帮助我们逃离痛苦 因为我们必须找到出路

translation.zh: 有种奇怪的满足感

translation.zh: 你懂吗？我们都希望

translation.zh: 因为这表示

translation.zh: 我们的存在具有独特意义

translation.zh: 我们不断被这样的讯息所吸引

translation.zh: 我们值得拥有我们渴望的一切

translation.zh: 没有什么阴谋论 也不是什么邪恶的计划

translation.zh: 只是 我认为

translation.zh: 当那刚好是能赢得人们注意的东西

translation.zh: 你建立起一个 利用人们的注意力来获利的经济体系

translation.zh: 你最后得到的文化

translation.zh: 大部分都建立在特权信息上

translation.zh: 传统的心理励志是 每个人都很特别且独特

translation.zh: 可以不同凡响

translation.zh: 而我觉得那很专制

translation.zh: 但没必要这样想

translation.en: because that's what everybody's life looks like.
translation.zh: 因为每个人的人生都是这样

translation.en: We're all sitting in our living room with our hand in our underwear,
translation.zh: 我们都坐在客厅 手插在内裤里

translation.en: scrolling the exact same shit on our phones.
translation.zh: 在手机上滑着一模一样的内容

translation.en: It's just, like, this is not reality.
translation.zh: 这根本不是现实

translation.en: There's all of these narratives out there that-that…
translation.zh: 外面有各种叙述

translation.en: that kind of convince us that,
translation.zh: 有点说服我们

translation.en: "Hey, you deserve to be this special guy or girl,
translation.zh: “你值得成为特别的男生或女生”

translation.en: and if you can just embody that life, you'll be problem free.
translation.zh: “只要能实现那种生活” “你就不会有问题了”

translation.en: You won't have to deal with pain again.
translation.zh: “再也不用面对痛苦”

translation.en: You won't have to sacrifice or struggle."
translation.zh: “再也不必牺牲或挣扎”

translation.en: And that's bullshit.
translation.zh: 全是胡说八道

translation.en: And look, the reason this message, like, "Life fucking sucks,
translation.zh: 听着 像是“人生烂透了”

translation.en: you're always gonna have to sacrifice, you're always gonna struggle,
translation.zh: “你永远都要牺牲 永远都得挣扎”

translation.en: you're always gonna have problems."
translation.zh: “永远都有问题”这类的信息

translation.en: The reason this… You don't hear this more is 'cause it doesn't sell.
translation.zh: 你不常听到这些是因为这不受欢迎

translation.en: You can't sell a car by telling people, like, "Hey, buy this car.
translation.zh: 你不能这样卖车 告诉大家 “买这辆车吧”

translation.en: You're still gonna be miserable, even though you bought it."
translation.zh: “就算买了车 你还是会很悲惨”

translation.en: Like, that doesn't move merchandise, that doesn't help the bottom line.
translation.zh: 这卖不了商品 无法增加收益

translation.en: And I don't think the problem is necessarily with, you know,
translation.zh: 我不认为问题一定在于…

translation.en: capitalism or the system or whatever, the problem is with us.
translation.zh: 资本主义或体制之类的 问题出在我们身上

translation.en: Like, we just don't understand how our own minds work.
translation.zh: 我们不了解自己的想法如何运作

translation.en: And so we've got to get straight with ourselves.
translation.zh: 所以我们必须坦率面对自己

translation.en: I think there's an undue psychological pressure
translation.zh: 我觉得有一股过度的心理压力

translation.en: to feel as though we're extraordinary in some way,
translation.zh: 要觉得自己在某方面是非凡的

translation.en: that we're doing something extraordinary.
translation.zh: 我们在做非凡的事

translation.en: And I think this pushes a sense of entitlement,
translation.zh: 我想这激发出了一种特权感

translation.en: it pushes a sense of, "Well, I deserve to have these things.
translation.zh: 激发出一种感觉 “我值得拥有这些东西”

translation.en: I deserve to be happy.
translation.zh: “我值得快乐”

translation.en: I'm great at something. People should know that."
translation.zh: “我有一技之长 大家应该要知道”

translation.en: I think if there was just a simple cultural acknowledgement
translation.zh: 我认为只要有简单的文化认知

translation.en: of, like, "Yeah. Most of us suck at most of the things we do,
translation.zh: 我认为只要有简单的文化认知 “我们多数人” “都不擅长我们做的很多事”

translation.en: and that's fine,"
translation.zh: “但没关系”

translation.en: we could escape these things.
translation.zh: 我们可以逃避这些事

translation.en: But in my case, I covered up my baggage and my insecurities
translation.zh: 但以我的例子来说 我用特权感掩盖

translation.en: with a sense of entitlement.
translation.zh: 我的包袱和不安全感

translation.en: And, you know, because so much of my pain
translation.zh: 因为我的很多痛苦

translation.en: revolved around intimacy and relationships and trust…
translation.zh: 都跟亲密关系、感情和信任有关

translation.en: I just became kind of an entitled… asshole…
translation.zh: 所以我变成一个自以为是的混蛋

translation.en: [laughs] …with a lot of relationships in my life.
translation.zh: 所以我变成一个自以为是的混蛋 谈过很多场恋爱

translation.en: From that pain, and from that place
translation.zh: 从那种痛苦

translation.en: of just not knowing what the hell to believe,
translation.zh: 那种不知道该相信什么

translation.en: not being able to trust anybody, I was, like,
translation.zh: 无法相信任何人的感觉 演变成

translation.en: "Well, fuck it. I'm… I'm gonna get what I want."
translation.zh: “管他的 我要得到我想要的”

translation.en: I just went into full over-compensation.
translation.zh: 我开始过度补偿自己

translation.en: I was kind of your classic, like, selfish player.
translation.zh: 我是典型的自私玩家

translation.en: You know, I cheated on girlfriends,
translation.zh: 我背叛了女友

translation.en: I… I was always the guy who would just disappear.
translation.zh: 我总是那种会突然消失的渣男

translation.en: My 20s is just like a-a fucking battlefield…
translation.zh: 我的20几岁 就像该死的战场

translation.en: …with, like, bomb craters where my relationships used to be.
translation.zh: 我的感情就像一个个炸弹坑

translation.en: It's just like strewn corpses
translation.zh: 到处散落着逝去的友谊

translation.en: of old friendships and romantic partners…
translation.zh: 和爱情伴侣的尸体

translation.en: …that I just completely decimated…
translation.zh: 而我就这样…完全毁灭了

translation.en: …mostly due to my own entitlement.
translation.zh: 大部分是因为我自我感觉良好

translation.en: I remember one time, in… in college, I kind of, like, stole my buddy's girl.
translation.zh: 我记得大学时 有一次我抢了我兄弟的女友

translation.en: I was at a mutual friend's place,
translation.zh: 我在一个共同朋友家

translation.en: and I was sitting on the couch with her, holding hands,
translation.zh: 我和她手牵手坐在沙发上

translation.en: and he walked in the room, he took one look at me and her,
translation.zh: 他走进房间 看了我和她一眼

translation.en: and immediately turned around and walked out of the house,
translation.zh: 然后立刻转身走出房子

translation.en: and he never spoke to me again.
translation.zh: 再也没跟我说过话

translation.en: And I just remember being like, wow.
translation.zh: 我只记得我当时心想“天啊”

translation.en: Like, this dude just, like, he's just jealous, you know,
translation.zh: “这家伙只是在嫉妒”

translation.en: that, like, I can get his girl, and he can't get her back or whatever.
translation.zh: “我追到他女友 但他无法挽回她”

translation.en: Like, I-I… to me, it was…
translation.zh: 对我来说

translation.en: I couldn't see it through, like, a normal human's eyes.
translation.zh: 我无法以正常人的眼光看待一切

translation.en: I can only see it through, like, my kind of obsessive, entitled eyes.
translation.zh: 我只能用 我偏执、自以为是的目光去看待

translation.en: I basically have this, like, four year period in my life,
translation.zh: 基本上我的人生 有四年的时间是这样度过

translation.en: where I have no friends from that period.
translation.zh: 那段期间 我没有任何朋友

translation.en: Like, I have friends from before that period. And I have friends from after that period.
translation.zh: 在那之前和之后 我都不缺朋友

translation.en: But that… There was, like, four or five years there
translation.zh: 但有四、五年的时间

translation.en: where none of those people talk to me anymore.
translation.zh: 那些人都不跟我说话了

translation.en: So, I… I'm a huge metal fan.
translation.zh: 我是金属乐迷

translation.en: And one of the interesting things about heavy metal is that
translation.zh: 重金属乐有趣的一点在于

translation.en: arguably the two greatest bands were originally one band.
translation.zh: 两个最伟大的乐团原本是同一个乐团

translation.en: …you want to say to everybody out there?
translation.zh: 你想对所有人说吗？

translation.en: Metal up your ass!
translation.zh: 金属制品去死吧！

translation.en: [Mark] Dave Mustaine was the original lead guitarist of Metallica.
translation.zh: 戴夫马斯泰恩 是金属制品乐团最初的主吉他手

translation.en: And he wrote a lot of the songs on Metallica's first and second records.
translation.zh: 他为金属制品的第一和第二张专辑 写了很多歌

translation.en: The problem was… was that both Dave Mustaine and James Hetfield,
translation.zh: 问题是 戴夫马斯泰恩和詹姆斯海特菲尔德

translation.en: who was the lead singer and songwriter of Metallica,
translation.zh: 金属制品的主唱和作曲家

translation.en: they're both young, rebellious kids.
translation.zh: 他们都是年轻又叛逆的孩子

translation.en: And so, they would both get drunk and just beat the shit out of each other.
translation.zh: 所以他们两个会喝醉 然后痛揍对方

translation.en: And so in the midst of recording their first… Metallica's first album,
translation.zh: 所以在录金属制品第一张专辑时

translation.en: Metallica just decided, "You know what? Let's get rid of Dave Mustaine."
translation.zh: 金属制品决定 “这样吧？把戴夫马斯泰恩赶走吧”

translation.en: So, they woke him up one day by just handing him a bus ticket.
translation.zh: 有天他们叫醒他 给了他一张巴士票

translation.en: And so mid-album, like, the day before they're gonna start recording,
translation.zh: 在专辑制作到一半时 就在他们开始录音的前一天

translation.en: Dave wakes up with a hangover,
translation.zh: 戴夫带着宿醉醒来

translation.en: and they just hand him a bus ticket and say, like, "Get the fuck out."
translation.zh: 他们给他一张巴士票 说“滚吧”

translation.en: That's how he found out he was out of the band.
translation.zh: 他就是这样发现自己被踢出乐团的

translation.en: And so he rode this, like, three-day bus back to LA.
translation.zh: 于是他搭了三天的巴士回洛杉矶

translation.en: And on the bus, you know, this fire started to build up inside him.
translation.zh: 在巴士上 他的内心燃起熊熊怒火

translation.en: And by the time he got back to California, he had decided,
translation.zh: 等他回到加州时 他决定

translation.en: "You know what? I'm gonna start a new metal band.
translation.zh: “知道吗？我要组个新的金属乐团”

translation.en: It's gonna be a better metal band,
translation.zh: “会是更棒的金属乐团”

translation.en: and it's gonna fucking kick Metallica's ass."
translation.zh: “而且会痛宰金属制品”

translation.en: And so sure enough, he got back,
translation.zh: 所以 想当然 他回来了

translation.en: he found better musicians, he started writing better songs,
translation.zh: 他找到更好的音乐人 他开始写更好的歌

translation.en: found better producers to record with,
translation.zh: 找到更好的制作人来录音

translation.en: and he produced what became known as Megadeth.
translation.zh: 他组成了后来众所皆知的麦加帝斯

translation.en: [man] You guys ready for Megadeth?
translation.zh: 你们准备好听麦加帝斯了吗？

translation.en: [Mark] Now, Megadeth went on to sell millions of albums.
translation.zh: 麦加帝斯之后卖出数百万张专辑

translation.en: They've toured the world dozens of times.
translation.zh: 他们开了数十场世界巡回演唱会

translation.en: They've played in stadiums.
translation.zh: 他们在体育馆表演过

translation.en: They're one of the biggest rock arena acts there's ever been, yet…
translation.zh: 他们在体育馆的摇滚演出 盛况空前 然而…

translation.en: The band he got kicked out of was Metallica,
translation.zh: 把他踢出的金属制品

translation.en: an even bigger rock band that sold even more albums,
translation.zh: 是一个更伟大的摇滚乐团 卖出更多专辑

translation.en: and played in even more stadiums, and was even more famous.
translation.zh: 在更多场馆演出 甚至也更出名

translation.en: And so, this put Mustaine in a really bizarre situation,
translation.zh: 这让马斯泰恩的处境很尴尬

translation.en: where he had achieved unimaginable success
translation.zh: 他取得了难以想象的成功

translation.en: by almost any stretch of the imagination.
translation.zh: 成就近乎梦幻

translation.en: But, like, the defining value that was kind of steering his career,
translation.zh: 但是 他的生涯目标

translation.en: which was to be better than Metallica, was never achieved.
translation.zh: 就是要比金属制品更优秀 却从未达成

translation.en: He was giving a fuck about the wrong thing.
translation.zh: 他搞错重点了

translation.en: He was so focused on one upping these other guys
translation.zh: 他一心只想赢过那些

translation.en: who had… who had insulted him, who had hurt him,
translation.zh: 羞辱过他、伤害过他的人

translation.en: that he missed all the amazing things that went on at the same time.
translation.zh: 所以他错过了 同时发生的所有美好事物

translation.en: It puts… it puts a person like him in a situation
translation.zh: 这让像他这样的人陷入一种处境

translation.en: where he can sell 20 million albums,
translation.zh: 他可以卖出两千万张专辑

translation.en: and play to 100,000 people, and feel like a failure,
translation.zh: 为十万人演出 却仍觉得自己很失败

translation.en: whereas any other rational person would feel like a great success.
translation.zh: 而这在任何理性的人眼中 都是非常成功的成就

translation.en: My first girlfriend I ever had,
translation.zh: 我第一个女友

translation.en: we were doing long-distance, doing the phone thing,
translation.zh: 跟我是远距离恋爱 都用电话联络

translation.en: seeing each other, like, every few months or whatever.
translation.zh: 每隔几个月才会见面

translation.en: It sucked.
translation.zh: 感觉糟透了

translation.en: But, you know, we were madly in love
translation.zh: 但我们当时疯狂相爱

translation.en: and when you're that age, you think love conquers everything.
translation.zh: 在那个年纪 你会以为爱能战胜一切

translation.en: So you're, like, "Oh, it's gonna be all right.
translation.zh: 所以你会想“一切都会没事的”

translation.en: We're gonna make it." And we did this for quite a while.
translation.zh: “我们会成功的” 我们这样交往了很久

translation.en: And suddenly one week, she's like… not… she's not around.
translation.zh: 突然有一个星期 她不见了

translation.en: You know, she's giving excuses and…
translation.zh: 她一直在找借口

translation.en: She's always got… Something's always come up and…
translation.zh: 她总是有事 而且…

translation.en: It's… She's not answering her phone, which never happened before.
translation.zh: 她不接电话 以前从没这样过

translation.en: So it started to feel really weird and I would try to confront her about it,
translation.zh: 感觉真的很奇怪 所以我试着跟她对质这件事

translation.en: and she'd kind of blow me off or…
translation.zh: 她有点敷衍我

translation.en: you know, make a big thing out of it, so I didn't know what was going on.
translation.zh: 说我小题大作 所以我一头雾水

translation.en: And then one day, I…
translation.zh: 然后有一天 我接到一通电话

translation.en: I just get a phone call from a number I don't recognize,
translation.zh: 然后有一天 我接到一通电话 一个我不认识的号码

translation.en: and I pick up the phone and it's this guy…
translation.zh: 我接起电话 是一个男人

translation.en: I can't remember his name.
translation.zh: 我不记得他的名字了

translation.en: It's, like, Derek or Eric or something.
translation.zh: 好像叫德瑞克还是艾瑞克吧

translation.en: Anyway, he's like, "Hey, man, we don't know each other,
translation.zh: 总之 他说 “老兄 我们不认识”

translation.en: but I know your girlfriend, and we need to talk."
translation.zh: “但我认识你女友 我们得谈谈”

translation.en: I'm like, "Okay."
translation.zh: 我说“好”

translation.en: He's like, "She's been cheating on you." And I was like…
translation.zh: 他说“她背着你偷吃”

translation.en: "Okay."
translation.zh: 我说“好” 当然起初我很怀疑

translation.en: Obviously, I'm skeptical at first, and so I'm like, "How do you know?"
translation.zh: 我说“好” 当然起初我很怀疑 我问“你怎么知道？”

translation.en: "Well, I know because she was cheating on you with me first,
translation.zh: 他回答“我知道” “是因为她先背着你跟我偷情”

translation.en: and now she's cheating on you with another guy."
translation.zh: “现在她又背着你跟别的男人偷情”

translation.en: I'm like, "What the fuck?"
translation.zh: 我说“搞什么？”

translation.en: He's like, "Don't worry. I'm gonna prove it to you."
translation.zh: 他说“别担心 我会证明给你看”

translation.en: [laughs] And so, this guy,
translation.zh: 所以这个人

translation.en: he's in front of her house with the phone,
translation.zh: 他拿着手机站在她家门口

translation.en: knocks on her door and he's, like, holding the phone by his side
translation.zh: 敲她的门 把手机拿在身旁

translation.en: with me on it.
translation.zh: 而我在电话另一头

translation.en: He knocks on the door and she comes to the door, and he, like, confronts her.
translation.zh: 他敲门 她来应门 他质问她

translation.en: And he's like, "What the hell are you doing with this guy here?
translation.zh: 他问“你跟这家伙在做什么？”

translation.en: I thought you were with me," or whatever, and they start arguing.
translation.zh: “我以为你跟我在一起” 然后他们开始吵架

translation.en: And she's like, "I'm not with you anymore, I'm with him."
translation.zh: 她说“我跟你分手了” “现在我跟他在一起”

translation.en: And then he's like, "What about your boyfriend, Mark?"
translation.zh: 他接着问“你男友马克呢？”

translation.en: And she's like, "Oh, you don't know anything about him.
translation.zh: 她说“你对他一无所知”

translation.en: It's none of your business," and like, blah, blah, blah.
translation.zh: “这不关你的事”之类的

translation.en: And then he, like, pulls out the phone and he's like, "Mark's right here."
translation.zh: 然后他拿出手机说“马克就在这里”

translation.en: [laughs] And she's like, "No, he's not."
translation.zh: 她说“不 他才不在”

translation.en: And then, like, he, like, makes her take the phone,
translation.zh: 然后他逼她拿走手机

translation.en: and then I'm like, "What the fuck is wrong with you?"
translation.zh: 接着我说“你到底有什么毛病？”

translation.en: And so she and I are, like, screaming at each other and all this stuff,
translation.zh: 我和她对彼此大吼大叫

translation.en: and then she dumps me, like, right there on the spot.
translation.zh: 然后她当场把我甩了

translation.en: I laid on my bed crying and I think I was just in shock.
translation.zh: 我躺在床上哭 我想我只是很震惊

translation.en: I mean, obviously, I was crying for her,
translation.zh: 我当然是为她而哭

translation.en: but I was grieving just this loss of this, like, naive view of the world…
translation.zh: 但我也很悲伤 这种天真的世界观破灭了

translation.en: that if you were in love, everything was going to be okay.
translation.zh: 以为只要相爱就能克服一切

translation.en: All of that just got smashed in that moment.
translation.zh: 那一刻 一切都毁了

translation.en: I thought I had a really great relationship with my girlfriend
translation.zh: 我以为我和女友的感情很好

translation.en: and so the fact that this could happen, was, like, just too much.
translation.zh: 所以发生这种事真的让我难以承受

translation.en: It was, like, caving in on me.
translation.zh: 好像世界要崩塌了

translation.en: I don't think I told anybody how angry I was.
translation.zh: 我没跟任何人说过我有多生气

translation.en: I didn't know how to express it without, like, losing myself.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么表达才不会情绪失控

translation.en: You know, you start developing these beliefs of, like,
translation.zh: 你会开始产生一些信念 像是

translation.en: "I'm fine. She was just a horrible person,
translation.zh: “我很好 她只是个烂人”

translation.en: and I didn't deserve this."
translation.zh: “我不该受到这种对待”

translation.en: And there's this perverse kind of certainly that emerges.
translation.zh: 然后就会浮现这种变态的想法

translation.en: You know, each failed relationship I had,
translation.zh: 每段失败的恋情

translation.en: I just used that as further evidence of,
translation.zh: 我都把它当作进一步的证据

translation.en: "Ah, well. This is just… this is just how things are.
translation.zh: 证明“对 事情就是这样”

translation.en: People are shitty." Nothing… [chuckles]
translation.zh: “人类很糟糕 一无是处”

translation.en: "Love never works out." You know?
translation.zh: “爱情不可能天长地久 是吧？”

translation.en: It was… That's how I saw things.
translation.zh: 我就是这样看待事物的

translation.en: You know, it's the classic victimhood entitlement.
translation.zh: 你懂吗？这是典型的受害者情节

translation.en: What happened with Dave Mustaine is… is a great example
translation.zh: 发生在戴夫马斯泰恩身上的事 是个很好的例子

translation.en: of how we all react to extremely painful situations.
translation.zh: 是个很好的例子 说明我们面对极度痛苦的情况时 都是如何反应的

translation.en: You know, the-the pain of getting kicked out of his first band,
translation.zh: 被第一个乐团踢出来的痛苦

translation.en: and-and feeling like… like he wasn't worthy of them,
translation.zh: 觉得自己配不上他们

translation.en: it… it forced him to construct this world view.
translation.zh: 迫使他建构了这个世界观

translation.en: This world view of, "I'm gonna be better than them.
translation.zh: 这个世界观就是“我要比他们更好”

translation.en: Everything I do has to be better than Metallica."
translation.zh: “我做的一切都要比金属制品更好”

translation.en: And we all do this in one way or another.

translation.zh: 年仅22岁的小野田 在二俣突击队的精锐部队受训

translation.zh: 并且在任何情况下都不能自杀

translation.zh: 几天内 大部分的日军 不是被杀就是被俘虏

translation.en: But Onoda, his burly sergeant, and two young privates evaded capture,
translation.zh: 但小野田和他魁梧的中士 以及两名年轻的二等兵逃过追捕

translation.zh: 躲进山里

translation.zh: 攻击补给线

translation.zh: 日本士兵该回家了

translation.zh: 小野田读了这些传单 但他相信这些都是假的

translation.zh: 小野田的中士中枪身亡

translation.zh: 小野田跟他仅存的同伴 发誓要为朋友的死报仇

translation.zh: 逃亡中尉的英勇功绩

translation.zh: 变成了外交危机

translation.zh: 一场大规模的寻回行动得到了资金

translation.zh: 散落到岛上各处

translation.zh: 还有一封来自天皇本人的信

translation.zh: 恳求这两人自首

translation.zh: 但小野田再次拒绝相信 这个消息是真的

translation.zh: 他依然认为 这一切都是美国人的诡计

translation.zh: 他再次坚持立场 继续战斗

translation.zh: 被护送到山里

translation.zh: 小野田看着哥哥喊出他小时候的绰号

translation.zh: 并唱着他们以前的校歌

translation.zh: 小冢遭到杀害

translation.zh: 发动想象中的战争

translation.zh: 现在只剩孤身一人

translation.zh: 我唯一做过的真正工作是…

translation.zh: 我在一家银行找到一份工作 那简直无聊死了

translation.zh: 有天下午我们走来走去 大家都在聊

translation.zh: 人们都在互相询问

translation.zh: “我要在夏天开出去”之类的

translation.zh: 轮到我时 我回答 “我想我会休息一年 环游世界”

translation.zh: 他们安静下来 气氛尴尬

translation.zh: 大家都看着我 好像觉得

translation.zh: “你有什么毛病？”

translation.zh: 就在那一刻 我意识到我不该在这里

translation.zh: 所以2009年 我出发到世界各地生活

translation.zh: 我想去看看世界 了解不同的文化

translation.zh: 认识不同类型的人 但同时…

translation.zh: 我害怕与人太亲近

translation.zh: 我害怕对一个地方、一个人

translation.zh: 社区或甚至城市过度投入

translation.zh: 我就像乐透彩球一样

translation.zh: 在世界各地跳来跳去

translation.zh: 在这里待三个月

translation.zh: 在那里待两个月 在这里待六周 在那里待一周

translation.zh: 最后我造访了60国 学了不少语言

translation.zh: 认识了数百人 度过许多美好时光

translation.zh: 我的生活围绕着尽可能累积经验

translation.zh: 去更多国家、做更多事

translation.zh: 参加更多派对、和更多女生约会

translation.zh: 永远都是更多、更多、更多

就像一种持续的冲动

translation.zh: 那把我吓得半死

translation.zh: 我会尽快逃向另一个方向

translation.zh: 你会把你的头整个埋进去

translation.zh: 我认为在社交和情感上 我感到非常迷失

translation.zh: 而我当时太年轻 无法真正理解原因

translation.en: In the course of-of writing all these years, I always…
translation.zh: 在写作的这些年里 我总是…

translation.en: was-was jealous of people who had rules and laws named after them.
translation.zh: 嫉妒那些以自己命名规则和定律的人

translation.en: And I was like, "Well, I want to be a cool kid,
translation.zh: 我心想“我想当个酷小孩”

translation.en: so I'm gonna name a law after myself."
translation.zh: “所以我要以自己命名一条定律”

translation.en: And-and, so I created something called Manson's Law of Avoidance,
translation.zh: 所以我创造了“曼森回避定律”

translation.en: which is essentially this.
translation.zh: 基本上是这样的…

translation.en: People will avoid an action or an experience
translation.zh: 人们会避免某种行为或经验

translation.en: in proportion to how much it threatens their identity and their world view.
translation.zh: 这取决于威胁到他们的身份认同 和世界观的严重程度

translation.en: And the interesting thing about Manson's Law of Avoidance
translation.zh: 而曼森回避定律有趣的地方则在于

translation.en: is that it's true for both… both positive and negative actions.
translation.zh: 它同时涵盖了正面和负面的行为

translation.zh: 正面来看 人们会自我毁灭

translation.zh: 是因为“不 我不想太成功”

translation.en: I don't want to live somewhere too fancy.
translation.zh: “我不想住在太豪华的地方”

translation.en: Like, that… that will… That's too threatening for my life,
translation.zh: 就像是“那对我的人生来说太危险”

translation.en: for the security of my life right now."
translation.zh: “对我现在的生命安全来说太危险”

translation.zh: 同样地 他们会避免 牵涉到很多风险的事情

translation.zh: “可能会太痛苦” “可能会让事情太困难”

translation.zh: 基本上 曼森定律是在说

translation.zh: 改变的阻力

translation.zh: 与我们如何看待自己

translation.zh: 以及如何看待世界的基础成正比

translation.zh: 以我来说 我的每段感情都是失调的

translation.zh: 每一段都是

translation.zh: 有一部分是因为我以为

translation.zh: 失调的感情很正常

translation.zh: 第一次听说传奇人物小野田中尉

translation.zh: 因此编造出来这样的童话故事

translation.zh: 寻找小野田的想法 是一趟值得的新冒险

translation.zh: 当然 当地军队在丛林里 已搜索将近30年

translation.zh: 仍一无所获

translation.zh: 数千张传单 却都没有收到回应

translation.zh: 但管他的 这个无赖大学辍学生嬉皮

translation.zh: 就是会找到他的人

translation.zh: 手无寸铁 没受过任何侦察或战术作战训练

translation.zh: 铃木前往卢邦岛 开始独自在丛林里游荡

translation.zh: 他的策略？大喊小野田的名字

translation.zh: 跟他说天皇陛下很担心他

translation.zh: 他四天就找到小野田了

translation.zh: 为什么小野田在经过30年

translation.zh: 和数百万美元的救援行动后

translation.zh: 决定在一个卑微的背包客面前现身？ 这很难说

translation.zh: 或者是他在铃木身上看到 年轻时爱冒险的自己

translation.zh: 那个仍值得拯救的自己

translation.zh: 他背着背包跪倒在地

translation.zh: 开始无法控制地哭泣

translation.zh: 你懂吗？那是大脑的垃圾食物

translation.zh: 味道很棒 非常好吃

translation.zh: 然后 在某个时刻 世界观会崩解

translation.zh: 那种分崩离析是必然的结果

translation.zh: 当你从心碎中走出来时 有趣的事情开始发生了

translation.zh: 首先 你开始跟别人约会

translation.zh: 你开始意识到规律

translation.zh: 对我来说 我开始注意到 我怪罪我第一任女友的很多鸟事

translation.zh: 我怪罪我第一任女友的很多鸟事

translation.zh: 在我开始跟其他女人约会后又出现了

translation.zh: 这让我不禁问起自己

translation.zh: 这让我开始反省我的行为

translation.zh: 和我的意图

translation.zh: 我花了好几年回想

translation.zh: 然后才意识到“天啊” “我真是个混蛋”

translation.zh: 有很多罪恶感和羞耻感

translation.zh: 人生永远都会有痛苦 永远都会有挣扎

translation.en: But if you can train yourself to not give a fuck about the pain,
translation.zh: 但如果你能训练自己不去在乎痛苦

translation.en: you become unstoppable.
translation.zh: 你就会变得势不可挡

translation.en: The emotional difficulty of change
translation.zh: 改变带来的情绪困难

translation.en: is always directly proportional to… to the scale of change,
translation.zh: 总是与改变的规模成正比 或与你身份认同的核心程度成正比

translation.en: or-or to how core it is to your identity.
translation.zh: 或与你身份认同的核心程度成正比

translation.en: It's not fun. It's not fun at all.
translation.zh: 不好玩 一点都不好玩

translation.en: [Mark] So, if I could create a superhero,
translation.zh: 如果我能创造超级英雄

translation.en: I would create Disappointment Panda.
translation.zh: 我要创造失望熊猫

translation.en: Have you ever seen those viral Egyptian cheese commercials?
translation.zh: 你看过那些爆红的埃及起司广告吗？

translation.en: Disappointment Panda is kind of like that.
translation.zh: 失望熊猫就像那样 爸 我们何不买些熊猫起司？

translation.en: [Mark] But instead of making people eat cheese,
translation.zh: 但你不是要让人们吃起司

translation.en: you'd be making them eat harsh truths about themselves,
translation.zh: 而是让他们吃下关于自己

translation.en: that nobody wanted to hear.
translation.zh: 没人想听的残酷真相

translation.en: You know, he'd say,
translation.zh: 它会说

translation.en: "Making a lot of money might make you feel good,
translation.zh: “赚很多钱也许会让你开心”

translation.en: but it won't make your kids love you."
translation.zh: “但不会让你的孩子爱你”

translation.en: Or he'd say, "You're not really sick,
translation.zh: 或者它会说“你不是真的生病”

translation.en: you're just avoiding the pain of having driven your wife away
translation.zh: “你只是在逃避因为不断抱怨”

translation.en: by your constant complaining."
translation.zh: “而把妻子逼走的痛苦”

translation.en: And then if you didn't listen…
translation.zh: 然后如果你不听

translation.en: Well, he'd have ways of making you listen.
translation.zh: 它有办法让你听进去

translation.en: The fact is that we need to eat our problem cheese.
translation.zh: 事实是我们必须吃掉我们的问题起司

translation.en: If we're not willing to face and admit our problems,
translation.zh: 如果我们不愿意面对并承认问题

translation.en: then we can't change and we can't grow.
translation.zh: 那我们就无法改变 也无法成长

translation.en: Disappointment Panda is the hero
translation.zh: 失望熊猫

translation.en: that none of us want, but we all actually need.
translation.zh: 失望熊猫 是我们都不想要的英雄 但其实我们都很需要

translation.en: Because we all have truths in our lives that we avoid hearing,
translation.zh: 因为我们人生中都有不想听到的真相

translation.en: that we don't want to confront or don't want to admit to ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们不想面对或不想对自己承认

translation.en: Yet, it's by confronting or admitting them
translation.zh: 然而 只要勇敢面对或承认

translation.en: that we can actually open the way to become better.
translation.zh: 就能打开让自己变得更好的道路

translation.en: A lot of people don't like hearing this.
translation.zh: 很多人不喜欢听到这个

translation.en: Like, we like to hear that our problems can be solved forever,
translation.zh: 我们喜欢听到 我们的问题永远都能解决

translation.en: we like to hear that there's some formula to be happy,
translation.zh: 我们喜欢听到 快乐有方程式

translation.en: live happily ever after.
translation.zh: 从此过着幸福快乐的生活

translation.en: But I'm sorry, but Disappointment Panda says,
translation.zh: 可是很抱歉 失望熊猫会说

translation.en: "No, there's not. This is simply how life is."
translation.zh: “不 没有 人生就是这样”

translation.en: And so, if we're forced to have problems,
translation.zh: 所以如果我们被迫面对问题

translation.en: then we might as well find the problems that we enjoy having in life.
translation.zh: 那不妨找找 我们在生活中享受的问题吧

translation.en: You know, when everybody hears this idea of, like-like not giving a fuck,
translation.zh: 大家听到 “不要在乎任何事”这个想法后

translation.en: you kind of imagine this, like, cool dude kicking back, like,
translation.zh: 都会想象是一个很酷、很放松的家伙

translation.en: "Yeah. Fuck it, man. Like, whatever."
translation.zh: “对 管他的 随便啦”

translation.en: Like a beach bum or something, and it's…
translation.zh: 像个在海边玩乐的家伙之类的 而这个想法…

translation.en: That's not what it is.
translation.zh: 并不是这样的

translation.en: You know, you have to give a fuck about something.
translation.zh: 你必须在乎一件事

translation.en: You have to care about something in your life.
translation.zh: 你必须在乎生命中的某样东西

translation.en: The question is, what are you choosing to care about?
translation.zh: 问题是 你选择在乎什么？

translation.en: Because when you choose your problems in your life,
translation.zh: 因为当你选择人生中的问题

translation.en: when you… when you find problems that you like having,
translation.zh: 你找到你喜欢面对的问题时

translation.en: that's when you suddenly find yourself not giving a fuck.
translation.zh: 你就会突然发现 自己并不在乎了

translation.en: When you don't give a fuck that you're making these sacrifices for your family.
translation.zh: 你完全不在乎你为家人做出这些牺牲

translation.en: When you don't give a fuck that it's hard to practice for another hour.
translation.zh: 你完全不在乎很难再练习一小时

translation.en: When you don't give a fuck
translation.zh: 你根本不在乎

translation.en: that you have to get up early in the morning
translation.zh: 你必须一大早起床

translation.en: and put in more time at work.
translation.zh: 花更多时间在工作上

translation.en: When you've found the struggle that enlivens and enriches you,
translation.zh: 你找到使你充满活力 并充实自己的挣扎后

translation.en: that's when you've achieved non-fuck-giving mastery.
translation.zh: 你就达到了“不在乎”的境界

translation.en: There's one thing I started to realize after traveling quite a bit
translation.zh: 在旅行了很久之后 我开始意识到一件事

translation.en: is that-that at some point, there's diminishing returns
translation.zh: 那就是到了某个时间点 新体验带来的效益

translation.en: to new experiences.
translation.zh: 会逐渐减少

translation.en: In that moment, like, that's a terrifying thought.
translation.zh: 在那一刻 那是很可怕的想法

translation.en: It's a really terrifying thought.
translation.zh: 真的很可怕

translation.en: But what you discover is that there's actually
translation.zh: 但你会发现承诺中其实有一种

translation.en: a newer, more subtle kind of freedom in that commitment.
translation.zh: 更新颖、更巧妙的自由

translation.en: I was… I eventually was forced to face my commitment issues.
translation.zh: 我最终被迫面对我的承诺问题

translation.en: for the simple fact that there was nowhere else left to run.
translation.zh: 原因很简单 我已经无处可逃

translation.en: I had literally run around the world…
translation.zh: 我真的跑遍全世界

translation.en: escaping any sense of commitment to a person or a place.
translation.zh: 逃离对一个人或一个地方的承诺感

translation.en: So, when you run out of places to run,
translation.zh: 所以当你无处可逃时

translation.en: it's like, "Well, shit. I've got to pick something."
translation.zh: 就只能思考“该死 我得做出选择”

translation.en: When I was 19 years old,
translation.zh: 我19岁时

translation.en: I went through probably the most transformational experience of my life.
translation.zh: 经历了人生中最重大的转变

translation.en: Josh, I-I met him at music school.
translation.zh: 我在音乐学校认识乔许

translation.en: He was actually kind of the first friend I made at music school.
translation.zh: 他其实是我在音乐学校 交到的第一个朋友

translation.en: He lived across the hall in the dorm from me.
translation.zh: 他就住在我的宿舍对面

translation.en: He was kind of like an older brother figure for me.
translation.zh: 他就像我的哥哥一样

translation.en: Very extroverted,
translation.zh: 非常外向

translation.en: bigger-than-life energy, you know?
translation.zh: 充满活力 你懂吗？

translation.en: [Mark] He was a natural performer.
translation.zh: 他是天生的表演者

translation.en: Like, at music school, it's a very strange dynamic
translation.zh: 在音乐学校 这是一种很奇怪的互动

translation.en: because there are a lot of status games that are going…
translation.zh: 因为有很多竞争

translation.en: People are very competitive.
translation.zh: 大家都很好胜

translation.en: "Oh, this band is more obscure and technical than the band you're into."
translation.zh: “这个乐团比你喜欢的乐团” “更鲜为人知、更专业”

translation.en: "I prefer late-period Brahms versus early-period Brahms."
translation.zh: “比起早期的布拉姆斯” “我更喜欢晚期的布拉姆斯”

translation.en: And like, you know, all this kind of pretentious stuff that happens.
translation.zh: 这类做作的话语都会出现

translation.en: And I'm hanging out in my dorm room,
translation.zh: 我在宿舍里闲晃

translation.en: and all of a sudden, the guy across the hall, like, blasts "Billie Jean".
translation.zh: 突然间 对面的家伙 大声放起了《比莉珍》

translation.en: Like, full blast.
translation.zh: 放到最大声

translation.en: It kind of makes a statement.
translation.zh: 算是种宣示

translation.en: It kind of says, "I don't give a fuck."
translation.zh: 像是在说 “我才不在乎 去你的做作音乐”

translation.en: Like… [laughs] "Fuck your pretentious music."
translation.zh: “我才不在乎 去你的做作音乐”

translation.en: [Mark] He was just this big, boisterous, fun-loving guy
translation.zh: 他是一个高大、活泼、爱玩的人

translation.en: who just wanted to sing and play drums and, like, have a good time
translation.zh: 只想唱歌、打鼓 享受美好时光

translation.en: and just didn't buy into all the bullshit.
translation.zh: 不相信那些鬼话

translation.en: To me, it was just magnetic to hang around him.
translation.zh: 对我来说 跟他在一起 就是很有吸引力

translation.en: [Mark] He was much more confident than I was.
translation.zh: 他比我更有自信

translation.en: Kind of a role model.
translation.zh: 就像是我的榜样

translation.en: There was a place, maybe 45 minutes outside of Dallas.
translation.zh: 有一个地方离达拉斯大概45分钟车程

translation.en: Out, kind of near this lake.
translation.zh: 在一座湖附近

translation.en: And, um, Josh, like, he told me,
translation.zh: 乔许跟我说

translation.en: "Dude, they just have these crazy parties every weekend."
translation.zh: “他们每个周末都举办疯狂的派对”

translation.en: And there was this… there was a cliff kind of like overlooking this lake,
translation.zh: 那里有个悬崖 俯瞰着这座湖

translation.en: and people would jump off that cliff into the water.
translation.zh: 人们会跳下悬崖 跳进水里

translation.en: So, we go to this party.
translation.zh: 所以我们参加了派对

translation.en: And then I asked him if he did it.
translation.zh: 我问他以前有没有跳过

translation.en: And he was like, "Oh, yeah, yeah. I've done it before."
translation.zh: 他回答“有啊 我以前跳过”

translation.en: I was like, "Oh, cool."
translation.zh: 我说“酷”

translation.en: And then, he asked me if I wanted to do it,
translation.zh: 然后他问我想不想跳

translation.en: and I was like, "Uh… I might watch you first."
translation.zh: 我回他“我可能先看你跳吧”

translation.en: You know, like, that sort of thing.
translation.zh: 之类的话

translation.en: And at some point during the party, I met… I met a girl
translation.zh: 在派对途中 我认识一个女生

translation.en: and kind of got into her, and…
translation.zh: 有点喜欢上她

translation.en: we got separated.
translation.zh: 所以我们就分开了

translation.en: And the last time I ever saw Josh,
translation.zh: 我最后一次见到乔许时

translation.en: I was walking up towards the house…
translation.zh: 我带着这个女生走向房子

translation.en: with the girl and he was coming down.
translation.zh: 我带着这个女生走向房子 而他正要下来

translation.en: And I said, "Hey, I'm gonna go get some food. Do you want some?
translation.zh: 我问“我要去吃点东西 你要吗？”

translation.en: He was like, "No, man. I'm good. I'll catch you later."
translation.zh: 他说“不用了 我们晚点见”

translation.en: And so, when I said, "Hey, where can I find you?",
translation.zh: 于是我问“我要去哪里找你？”

translation.en: he was like, "Seek the truth for yourself,
translation.zh: 他说“自己去寻找真相”

translation.en: and I'll meet you there."
translation.zh: “我会在那里跟你碰面”

translation.en: So, I just, like, laughed and, like, "All right, dude, whatever."
translation.zh: 我就笑了 回答他“好吧 随便”

translation.en: [chuckles] "I'll see you at the truth."
translation.zh: “我们在真相那里见”

translation.en: You know, as if we all know where the truth is.
translation.zh: “我们在真相那里见” 好像我们都知道真相在哪里

translation.en: And, uh… and so then, I went up to the house,
translation.zh: 然后 我们去了那栋房子

translation.en: and then when we came out, everybody was gone.
translation.zh: 出来的时候 所有人都不见了

translation.en: And so it's, like, this weird, surreal, like, "What the fuck?" type moment.
translation.zh: 感觉很奇怪 很不真实 我心想“搞什么鬼？”

translation.en: And so we walked down to the water,
translation.zh: 于是我们走到水边

translation.en: and I started looking for Josh and I can't find him.
translation.zh: 我开始找乔许 但找不到他

translation.en: There's, like, ambulances and police cars and stuff
translation.zh: 有救护车和警车

translation.en: with the lights going,
translation.zh: 灯都亮着

translation.en: and there were a couple of guys, like, in the water, swimming around.
translation.zh: 还有几个人在水里游来游去

translation.en: And then I remember I walked up
translation.zh: 我记得我走向

translation.en: to, uh, this guy and this girl, and I asked them.
translation.zh: 一男一女 我问他们

translation.en: I'd seen them talking to Josh earlier, and I asked them.
translation.zh: 我看到他们稍早跟乔许说过话 所以我询问他们

translation.en: And the girl just starts crying, like, just bawl…
translation.zh: 结果那女生开始哭泣 放声大哭

translation.en: Like as soon as I asked her, she just starts bawling.
translation.zh: 我一问她 她就放声大哭

translation.en: And then at that point, I'm like, "Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 那时我心想“天啊”

translation.en: It's him. Like, he's the one who went down."
translation.zh: “是他 他就是那个倒下的人”

translation.en: And I must have walked around the water for, like, an hour, I guess.
translation.zh: 我好像绕着水边走了一小时吧

translation.en: And… it just starts dawning on me, like, he's not here.
translation.zh: 然后我才开始意识到 他不在这里了

translation.en: I remember a police officer came up to me…
translation.zh: 我记得有个警察走向我

translation.en: and asked me if I knew him and I said, "Yeah."
translation.zh: 问我认不认识他 我说“认识”

translation.en: I don't remember what she asked, I don't remember…
translation.zh: 我不记得她问了什么 不记得…

translation.en: I think she gave up.
translation.zh: 我想她放弃了

translation.en: I got in my car and I started driving back to Austin.
translation.zh: 我上了车 开车回奥斯汀

translation.en: And so I called my dad. I was working for my dad that summer,
translation.zh: 我打电话给我爸 那年夏天

translation.en: and I called him and I was gonna tell him, like,
translation.zh: 我在帮我爸工作 我打电话跟他说

translation.en: "Hey, I'm… I'm not gonna make it to work today."
translation.zh: “今天我没办法去上班”

translation.en: And then I just fucking lost it.
translation.zh: 然后我就崩溃了

translation.en: I-I felt like a little boy…
translation.zh: 我觉得自己像个小男孩

translation.en: crying to his father.
translation.zh: 在向父亲哭诉

translation.en: You know, it's like, you know, when you're like a little, little kid,
translation.zh: 就像小时候

translation.en: and you just grab your parent, and just like cry everything out into them.
translation.zh: 紧紧抓住父母 对着他们哭诉一切

translation.en: Like, it was like that.
translation.zh: 就像那样

translation.en: I've been depressed many times in my life, but, like, that was…
translation.zh: 我一生中沮丧过很多次 但那是…

translation.en: I've never, like, felt a bleakness.
translation.zh: 我从未感受到绝望

translation.en: Like, just a pure… nothingness.
translation.zh: 只有纯粹的虚无

translation.en: I used to have dreams of him.
translation.zh: 我以前会梦到他

translation.en: I remember I had this one dream…
translation.zh: 我记得我做过一个梦

translation.en: where he and I were sitting in a jacuzzi together.
translation.zh: 梦到他和我坐在按摩浴缸里

translation.en: And I remember telling him,
translation.zh: 我记得我告诉他

translation.en: "Hey, man, I'm… I'm really sorry you died."
translation.zh: “老兄 我很遗憾你死了”

translation.en: [Mark] He was like… he's like, "Why do you care that I'm dead,
translation.zh: 他说“你何必在乎我的死活？”

translation.en: when you're still so afraid to live?"
translation.zh: “你明明那么害怕活着？”

translation.en: And I woke up from that dream just, like, a fucking mess, total mess.
translation.zh: 我从那个梦里醒来 整个人一团糟

translation.en: But I had this very powerful realization that,
translation.zh: 但我强烈地意识到

translation.en: if there's no reason to do anything,
translation.zh: 如果没有理由做任何事

translation.en: there's also no reason to not do anything.
translation.zh: 那也没有理由什么都不做

translation.en: Like, there's no reason to be ashamed, there's no reason to be afraid.
translation.zh: 没有理由感到羞愧 没有理由害怕

translation.en: And so that fall, I-I really…
translation.zh: 所以那年秋天 我真的…

translation.en: it really changed me a lot.
translation.zh: 这真的改变了我很多

translation.en: You know, before he died, I was a very, like, prototypical…
translation.zh: 在他去世前 我是个典型的…

translation.en: stoner… middleclass stoner kid, you know.
translation.zh: 吸大麻的人 中产阶级吸大麻的小孩

translation.en: Like, too cool for school, too cool to care.
translation.zh: 自以为很酷 不屑上学 也不屑在乎一切

translation.en: I thought I didn't give a fuck, you know,
translation.zh: 我以为我不在乎

translation.en: but it's like I actually gave way too many fucks.
translation.zh: 但我其实在乎太多了

translation.en: And that's why I was scared to really do anything.
translation.zh: 所以我什么都不敢做

translation.en: And when he died, it was a wake up call of like,
translation.zh: 他过世后 我恍然大悟

translation.en: "Dude…
translation.zh: “老兄 你要在乎”

translation.en: you've got to care. You've got to pick something and care."
translation.zh: “老兄 你要在乎” “你必须选择一件事并好好在乎”

translation.en: 'Cause it can be gone… any moment.
translation.zh: 因为生命随时可能消失

translation.en: It doesn't matter how old you are, doesn't matter how…
translation.zh: 无论你几岁 无论…

translation.en: how fit you are, or whatever, like…
translation.zh: 你多健康

translation.en: It can… When it goes, it goes fast,
translation.zh: 生命消失的时候 很快就不见了

translation.en: and… nobody is prepared for it.
translation.zh: 没有人准备好面对死亡

translation.en: When I… when I think about Josh, I-I just… I think he'd be proud of me.
translation.zh: 想到乔许时 我想他会以我为荣

translation.en: I think he kind of felt like an older brother to me too, you know?
translation.zh: 我想他也觉得 自己就像是我的哥哥 你懂吗？

translation.en: I think he kind of saw that I needed to be pushed.
translation.zh: 我想他知道我需要被推一把

translation.en: And he was that friend who pushed me.
translation.zh: 他就是推我一把的朋友

translation.en: He would fucking love this.
translation.zh: 他会爱死这个的

translation.en: He would love every second of it.
translation.zh: 他会爱死每分每秒

translation.en: I have this weird tendency whenever I visit someplace…
translation.zh: 我有一种奇怪的倾向 每当我前往…

translation.en: high.
translation.zh: 高处时

translation.en: I want to stand as close to the edge as possible.
translation.zh: 我想站得离边缘越近越好

translation.en: There's kind of like this unconscious awareness your body has
translation.zh: 身体会有一种无意识的觉察

translation.en: whenever you're close to an edge that could kill you.
translation.zh: 知道只要你靠近边缘 这可能会要了你的命

translation.en: And as soon as you're within, you know, say ten feet, that…
translation.zh: 一进入三米内

translation.en: your body is in alert status.
translation.zh: 你的身体就会进入警戒状态

translation.en: It just kind of… it sends this jolt of anxiety through you.
translation.zh: 让你感到一阵焦虑

translation.en: And then you're forced to confront that anxiety,
translation.zh: 然后你被迫面对那种焦虑

translation.en: and then you take another step.
translation.zh: 接着又会跨出另一步

translation.en: And each step, the anxiety just start compounding
translation.zh: 每走一步 焦虑开始加剧

translation.en: to the point where your hands are shaking,
translation.zh: 接着你的手会发抖

translation.en: your scalp is sweating,
translation.zh: 头皮在冒汗

translation.zh: 一切要结束的跑马灯

translation.en: That's what I find when I get close to a cliff edge.
translation.zh: 我接近悬崖边时 就会有这种感觉

translation.en: It brings me back to that place of pure thankfulness for being alive.
translation.zh: 这让我回到 纯粹感恩自己还活着的那种境界

translation.en: But there's really only a few things in life
translation.zh: 但人生中… 真的只有几件事值得去在乎

translation.en: that are ever worth giving a fuck about.
translation.zh: 真的只有几件事值得去在乎

translation.en: Only in the face of death,
translation.zh: 只有在面对死亡时

translation.en: all of the superficial and bullshitty values that we buy into
translation.zh: 我们信奉的肤浅和狗屁价值观

translation.en: start to fall away.
translation.zh: 才会开始消失

translation.en: You start to realize that
translation.zh: 你开始意识到

translation.en: that the dumb status games you play no longer mean anything.
translation.zh: 你参与的愚蠢竞争不再有任何意义

translation.en: Or that the achievements and accolades that you struggled for so many years for,
translation.zh: 或者你奋斗多年的成就和荣誉

translation.en: nobody cares about when you're gone.
translation.zh: 在你死后 也没人在乎了

translation.en: When we avoid the question of death,
translation.zh: 逃避死亡的问题时

translation.en: that's when we get highjacked by silly and superficial and hateful ideas.
translation.zh: 就会被愚蠢、肤浅且可恨的想法劫持

translation.en: It's when we become certain in ourselves,
translation.zh: 我们会对自己莫名肯定

translation.en: even though we have no clue what's going on.
translation.zh: 即使我们根本搞不清楚状况

translation.en: The gravity of our entitlement pulls all of our attention inwards,
translation.zh: 我们严重自我感觉良好 会把我们的注意力都往内拉

translation.en: to become obsessed with our problems, to convince ourselves
translation.zh: 对我们的问题变得执迷 并说服自己

translation.en: that our problems are somehow at the center of the universe,
translation.zh: 我们的问题某种程度上是宇宙的中心

translation.en: that we are at the center of all injustices,
translation.zh: 我们处于所有不公义的中心

translation.en: that we are the ones who are destined for greatness,
translation.zh: 我们是注定要成就伟大的人

translation.en: that we are the ones who deserve something over others.
translation.zh: 我们比其他人更值得拥有一切

translation.en: Without acknowledging the ever-present gaze of death,
translation.zh: 不去承认死亡无所不在的凝视

translation.en: the superficial begins to feel important,
translation.zh: 肤浅的事物会开始变得重要

translation.en: and the important starts to feel superficial.
translation.zh: 而重要的事物会开始变得肤浅

translation.en: Thinking about death removes all that.
translation.zh: 思考死亡 就会消除这一切

translation.en: It forces you to see
translation.zh: 迫使你认清

translation.en: that 99 percent of the shit going on in your day-to-day life
translation.zh: 迫使你认清 每天生活中99%的鸟事

translation.en: doesn't fucking matter.
translation.zh: 根本不重要

translation.en: Death is the only certainty in life.
translation.zh: 死亡是生命中唯一必然的事

translation.en: Therefore death must be the compass
translation.zh: 因此死亡必须是我们

translation.en: by which we orient all of our values and decisions.
translation.zh: 所有价值观和决定的方针

translation.en: How are you using your time?
translation.zh: 如何运用你的时间？

translation.en: How are you using your limited fucks?
translation.zh: 如何运用你有限的精力？

translation.en: Who are you going to be with?
translation.zh: 要跟谁在一起？

translation.en: This constant remembering of my own mortality,
translation.zh: 不断记住自己的死亡

translation.en: for me, it's the most effective tool for unraveling everything.
translation.zh: 对我来说 就是解开一切问题 最有效的工具

translation.en: My sense of entitlement, my closed-up identity,
translation.zh: 我的特权感、封闭的自我

translation.en: my irrational certainties.
translation.zh: 不理性的确信

translation.en: By remembering that it's all a bunch of dust
translation.zh: 记住这一切都只是

translation.en: that will soon be gone…
translation.zh: 很快就会消失的尘埃

translation.en: …it's easier to let go.
translation.zh: 就会比较容易放手

translation.en: It's this ability to choose ourselves
translation.zh: 就是这种在无尽的模糊中

translation.en: in an endless ambiguity that makes us great.
translation.zh: 选择自我的能力 让我们变得伟大

translation.en: You don't have to go do something to feel these things.
translation.zh: 你不必去做任何事才能感受到这一切

translation.en: You don't have to go be something to realize these things.
translation.zh: 你不必去成为什么才能意识到这一切

translation.en: You simply are them.
translation.zh: 你就是这一切

translation.en: The more I think about my own death,
translation.zh: 我越是思考自己的死亡

translation.en: the brighter life gets.
translation.zh: 人生就越是光明

translation.en: The quieter the world becomes.
translation.zh: 世界变得越安静

translation.en: The easier decisions become.
translation.zh: 做决定也变得更容易

translation.en: You, too, are going to die one day,
translation.zh: 你总有一天也会死

translation.en: but that's because you are fortunate enough to have lived.
translation.zh: 但那是因为你有幸活了下来

translation.en: And you may not feel this right now. You may not feel any of this.
translation.zh: 你现在可能感觉不到 你可能完全感觉不到

translation.en: But go stand on a cliff sometime and maybe you will.
translation.zh: 但偶尔去站在悬崖边 也许你就会感觉到了
